all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Be patient in afflictions, for thou shalt have many; but endure them, for, lo, I am with thee, even unto the end of thy days.
Doctrine and Covenants 24:8
Quote of the Day
"Though I did not understand all the words [of Christ], His words comforted me, lifted my soul, and gave me hope."
Takashi Wada | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
